participants.name:

participants.description: Lives in Saint John's, Antigua and Barbuda

messages.message:
Brian
Jamie is an awesome dude! We need to help him work harder and love more. You and I need to exercise our brain. Time is running out, we share Mindset!
I am a scientist there is no such this as coincidence !
I think you were missing the voice of reason in your life until now? Where do we go from here?

Brian
I am ahead of my time right now. I can absorb more knowledge than I can use, what is my ambition?
Our minds are losing data as we speak!
My ambition. As a scientist. I will prove coincidence does not exist only opportunity.
Who am I?
We can end all violence and war if we start working together today.
Jaime is hindering our conversation.
Everything takes too long to download!

Brian
I can absorb knowledge faster than the internet!

Brian
Are you using Reddit captchas to moderate my voice? It is taking too long for me to be heard.
Do you and I need to have a conversation about drugs Mr?
I just sent him this message: Jaime said you are astral projecting in to me right now.
I need more distractions quickly!
Obama is Satan and I'm scared

Brian
When Jamie stops acting like a wild dog I will let his dog into my garden

Brian
I am time. I am science. You are my voice. Any questions?

Brian
This is just a big joke.

Brian
https://www.reddit.com/r/conspiracy/comments/52wg11/my_personal_account_of_transcendence/
My personal account of transcendence • /r/conspiracy
reddit: the front page of the internet
reddit.com
We share a common friend.

Ryan
you sound a lot like me brian i appreciate you reaching out

Brian
Thank you for connecting!  Is the message I am thinking to automatically send when people accept my request.

Brian
What are you doing with tags?  Who reads 
https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/ryanandrewrichardstoffko3221989
 ?
Are you basking in the glory of someone sharing your ambition?

Brian
Q: Why don't traffic lights ever go swimming?
A: Because they take too long to change!

Brian
Q: What is blue and goes ding dong?
A: An Avon lady at the North Pole!

Ryan
Hey what's up brian

The tags allow me to organize large amounts of information. That tag in particular is my full name and my birthdate; came across an interesting way to view the world overseas and began applying it to my daily life- but I need to program a few things..... which I kept in order via simple hashtags. They also allow me to randomly come across stories from my past in a way which was humorous and random while allowing me to continue to sort new information as well.

Ryan
Sorry for the late response- I am rarely on my laptop any more and I don't have messenger installed on my phone or ipad because I get way to many distractions
hope all is well man
